oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A MATLAB toolbox for QFT-based synthesis of linear / nonlinear lumped and linear distributed systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NATARAJ, PSV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: computer software
process control
software tools
linear control systems
frequency domain analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We present QFT IIT, a MATLAB toolbox for quantitative feedback theory (QFT)-based synthesis of robust feedback systems. QFT IIT can handle several system classes including linear and nonlinear, single input-output and multi input-output, output and internal variable feedback, and linear distributed with distributed or point feedback types. We used QFT IIT to successfully solve a large number of robust control problems at The Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings IEEE / IFAC Joint Symposium on Computer-Aided Control System Design, Tucson, AZ, USA, 7-9 March 1994, 513-517
